docs.snippet: The Kansas City Royals took their dream season to the limit, falling just short of their first World Series title since 1985....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Kansas City Royals took their dream season to the limit, falling just short of their first World Series title since 1985.

headline.main: Royals' Dream Season Falls Short in World Series
headline.print_headline: Royals' Dream Season Falls Short in World Series

docs.snippet: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about Thursday:...
docs.lead_paragraph: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about Thursday:

docs.snippet: Madison Bumgarner closes it out and the San Francisco Giants hold off the Kansas City Royals 3-2 in Game 7 for their third World Series title in five years....
docs.lead_paragraph: Madison Bumgarner closes it out and the San Francisco Giants hold off the Kansas City Royals 3-2 in Game 7 for their third World Series title in five years.

headline.main: Bumgarner, Giants Beat Royals 3-2 to Win Series
headline.print_headline: Bumgarner, Giants Beat Royals 3-2 to Win Series

docs.snippet: Madison Bumgarner and the San Francisco Giants succeeded where no team had in 3 1/2 decades, winning Game 7 on the road for their third World Series title in five years....
docs.lead_paragraph: Madison Bumgarner and the San Francisco Giants succeeded where no team had in 3 1/2 decades, winning Game 7 on the road for their third World Series title in five years.

headline.main: Bumgarner, Giants Beat KC 3-2 to Win World Series
headline.print_headline: Bumgarner, Giants Beat KC 3-2 to Win World Series

docs.snippet: In Kansas City, Game 7 of the World Series conjures up memories of Bret Saberhagen's brilliance, a St. Louis meltdown and the only Royals championship in 1985....
docs.lead_paragraph: In Kansas City, Game 7 of the World Series conjures up memories of Bret Saberhagen's brilliance, a St. Louis meltdown and the only Royals championship in 1985.

headline.main: Game 7 of World Series: 'A Gift for Everyone'
headline.print_headline: Game 7 of World Series: 'A Gift for Everyone'

docs.snippet: The Kansas City Royals got an inspired outing from pitcher Yordano Ventura and woke from their hitting slumber to rout the San Francisco Giants 10-0 and send the World Series to a decisive Game Seven on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Kansas City Royals got an inspired outing from pitcher Yordano Ventura and woke from their hitting slumber to rout the San Francisco Giants 10-0 and send the World Series to a decisive Game Seven on Tuesday.

headline.main: Royals Force Deciding Game Seven With 10-0 Rout
headline.print_headline: Royals Force Deciding Game Seven With 10-0 Rout
